title: 20 Card Graded T206 Lot w/HOF & SL - $450
author: marcdelpercio

posts.post_title: 20 Card Graded T206 Lot w/HOF & SL - $450
posts.post_content:
Hello.  Here is a 20 card graded T206 lot.  Though they are all obviously lower grade, most present well for the technical grade and there are only a couple of real beaters in the bunch.  Lot includes five Hall of Famers and a Southern Leaguer.  Asking $450 delivered for the lot.  Paypal, cash, check, or money order all fine.  Thanks for looking!

Cards pictured are as follows:

Ames (portrait) SGC 10
Baker HOF -Polar Bear- SGC 10
Bates SGC 10
Beaumont SGC A
Bell (hands above head) PSA 1
Byrne -Sovereign- GAI 2
J.J. Clarke PSA 1
Ewing SGC 20
Jennings (both hands showing) HOF SGC 10
Leifield (pitching) SGC 10
Leibhardt SGC 10
Lumley PSA 1
McGraw (glove at hip) HOF SGC 10
Rhodes SGC 10
Tinker (bat off shoulder) HOF PSA A
Titus PSA 2
Wagner (bat on right shoulder) PSA 1
Weimer SCD A
Willis (pitching) HOF BVG 1
F. White -Old Mill- SL GAI A
Am I crazy?  That Old Mill back looks brown to me!

[quote name="4815162342" post=849319]Am I crazy?  That Old Mill back looks brown to me![/QUOTE]

You're crazy!  :D  White isn't possible with a Brown Old Mill back.

[quote name="Abravefan11" post=849340]You're crazy!  :D  White isn't possible with a Brown Old Mill back.[/QUOTE]

Thanks Tim!  I figured as much :)

Daryl,
Maybe you've discovered the first and should jump on this one-of-a-kind lot immediately :D  No, Tim's right of course...White isn't possible with a brown back but my scanner apparently did not know this and tried to assign one to him anyway.  Thanks for looking!

...funny, but I just sold another T206 with a Nelson Tisdale back stamp... Maybe I should start a Howe McCormick-esque collection.......

:p
See...there are ENDLESS untold treasures in this lot!  Maybe I should raise the price? :)
One bump for a price drop.  $450 delivered for the lot.  Thanks!
